'''Sophie''' is a fellow employee of [[Bloomingdale's]] along with [[Rachel Greene]]. She is constantly picked on by her boss [[Joanna]] and is treated extremely poorly. She's extremely happy when Joanna is killed.

==Appearances==
*"[[The One Where Ross And Rachel Take A Break]]" (First appearance)

*"[[The One With The Cuffs]]"
*"[[The One Where They're Going To Party]]"
